revision.text: Probably: The history of Sir Charles Grandison : in a series of letters published from the originals, by Samuel Richardson. (London : Printed for S. Richardson, and sold by C. Hitch and L. Hawes, in Pater-noster Row, by J. and J. Rivington, in St. Paul's Church-Yard, by Andrew Millar, in the Strand, by R. and J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall, and by J. Leake, at Bath, MDCCLIV [1754].) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/24299254
